name: ORD_AUD_ASGN_POOLS
description: This table contains the audit information about the list of assigned pools for an imaging procedure.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASGN_POOLS_EXTERNAL_VALUES
columns.description: Audit item for list of assigned pools (external values) for an imaging procedure.  The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at RIS_ASGN_POOL.RAD_ASGN_PLS_ID. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.

columns.name: ASGN_POOLS_PLS_IDS
columns.description: Audit item for list of assigned pools (IDs) for an imaging procedure. The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at RIS_ASGN_POOL.RAD_ASGN_PLS_ID.
